headline: PulteGroup Reports Fourth Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: ATLANTA, January 29, 2026--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM) announced today financial results for its fourth quarter ended December 31, 2025. For the quarter, the Company reported net income of $502 million, or $2.56 per share. Reported net income for the period includes: a pre-tax charge of $81 million, or $0.31 per share, associated with the intended divestiture of certain manufacturing assets; pre-tax land impairment charges totaling $35 million, or $0.14 per share; and a pre-tax insurance benefi

content.title: PulteGroup Reports Fourth Quarter 2025 Financial Results
content.summary: ATLANTA, January 29, 2026--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM) announced today financial results for its fourth quarter ended December 31, 2025.
